title: New: Mykki Blanco â€“ Kingpinning (Ice Cold) (Prod. by Brenmar)
content: Tomorrow Mykki Blanco finally releases his debut Mixtape, Cosmic Angel: The Illuminati Prince/ss, and should if the world has any sense, symbolise the start of a new movement. Blanco has been gaining more and more hype over the past few months, and rightly so, his music has a transgressive quality that rejects boundaries on its own terms, rather than simply jumping through the fractures and blemishes formed by his contemporaries like Death Grips and Le1f. What Blanco does is different, his character is brash, bitchy and aggressive just like the fore mentioned artists but the difference is simple. Those artists want to change the world, Blanco wants to own it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
